Removes virtues, gives Wroth, Lust, Lunatic, and the opinion that the caster is Master.
Removes virtues, gives Slow, Wroth, Lust, Lunatic, and the opinion that the caster is Master.
Removes positive mental traits, gives Imbecile and a positive opinion of the attacker.
Removes positive mental traits, gives Slow and a positive opinion of the attacker.
Removes illness traits and simple wounds.
Removes some diseases and more severe wounds and disfigurements.
Removes major diseases and major physical ailments to include regenerating lost body parts.
This selection will add a random person to your court.
The target will permanently lose a fraction of their health, as well as obtain a random minor to moderate illness effect.
A new character with a whore trait will be added to your court.
This will add an NPC to your court.
Jessica's shows can result in a variety of outcomes (modifiers, trait gain/loss, or nothing)
Trying to sway someone with money can damage their view of you if they don't accept it.
Is allowed to choose a whether or not they shall become a mage at this time\n
One of the risks of dealing with such powers is that our mortal shell may suffer severely as a result.
One of the risks of dealing with such powers is that our mortal shell may suffer an inconvenience as a result.
While others suffer negative effects in dealing with such powers, there are those who seem to be empowered by it.
While others suffer negative effects in dealing with such powers, there are those who seem to benefit by it.
You are ready to begin the process and time investment necessary to become a mage (gaining the trait) within the society.
You are opting to not pursue becoming a mage within the society.
Ignores the sensation in an attempt to claim greater power. A typically unwise choice.
